param.help: in GFF3. This is required so we know where to map features. E.g. where results of which CDS Protein32 match up to. The query IDs in your blast results should MATCH some feature IDs in your GFF3 file.

param.label: Minimum Gap Size
param.help: before a new match_part feature is created
param.name: min_gap

param.label: Is this a protein blast search?
param.name: is_protein

param.label: Autogenerate SNP Track
param.help: Not recommended for deep coverage BAM files
param.name: auto_snp
